================
include
================

{% include "muh.html" %}
{% include helper %}
{% include ["foo.html", "bar.html"] %}
{% include ("foo.html", "bar.html") %}
{% include ["foo.html", "bar.html", foo] %}
{% include ("foo.html", "bar.html", foo) %}
{% include "header" with context %}
{% include "header" without context %}
{% include ["missing", "missing2"] ignore missing %}
{% include ["missing", "missing2"] ignore missing with context%}
{% include ["missing", "missing2"] ignore missing without context%}

----

(source
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement
        (include_statement
          (string_literal)))))
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement
        (include_statement
          (identifier)))))
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement
        (include_statement
          (list_literal
            (expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression
                    (literal
                      (string_literal))))))
            (expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression
                    (literal
                      (string_literal)))))))))))
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement
        (include_statement
          (tuple_literal
            (expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression
                    (literal
                      (string_literal))))))
            (expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression
                    (literal
                      (string_literal)))))))))))
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement
        (include_statement
          (list_literal
            (expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression

                      (string_literal))))))
            (expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression

    (words))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement
        (include_statement
          (tuple_literal
            (expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression

                  (primary_expression
                    (identifier))))))))))
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement
        (include_statement
          (string_literal)
          (include_attribute
            (attribute_context))))))
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement
        (include_statement
          (string_literal)
          (include_attribute
            (attribute_context))))))
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement
        (include_statement
          (list_literal
            (expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression
                    (literal
                      (string_literal))))))
            (expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression
                    (literal
                      (string_literal)))))))
          (include_attribute
            (attribute_ignore))))))
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement
        (include_statement
          (list_literal
            (expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression
                    (literal
                      (string_literal))))))
            (expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression
                    (literal
                      (string_literal)))))))
          (include_attribute
            (attribute_ignore))
          (include_attribute
            (attribute_context))))))
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement
        (include_statement
          (list_literal
            (expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression
                    (literal
                      (string_literal))))))
            (expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression
                    (literal
                      (string_literal)))))))
          (include_attribute
            (attribute_ignore))
          (include_attribute
            (attribute_context))))))
  (definition
    (words)))

================
complex
================

{% for item in seq recursive -%}
    [{{ loop.previtem.a if loop.previtem is defined else 'x' }}.{{
    item.a }}.{{ loop.nextitem.a if loop.nextitem is defined else 'x'
    }}{% if item.b %}<{{ loop(item.b) }}>{% endif %}]
{%- endfor %}

----

(source
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement
        (for_statement
          (in_expression
            (identifier)
            (binary_operator)
            (expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression
                    (identifier))))))))))
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (render_expression
      (expression
        (expression
          (expression
            (binary_expression
              (unary_expression
                (primary_expression
                  (identifier)))))
          (expression
            (binary_expression
              (unary_expression
                (primary_expression
                  (identifier))))))
        (expression
          (binary_expression
            (unary_expression
              (primary_expression
                (identifier))))))
      (ternary_expression
        (expression
          (expression
            (binary_expression
              (unary_expression
                (primary_expression
                  (identifier)))))
          (expression
            (binary_expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression
                    (identifier))))
              (binary_operator)
              (builtin_test))))
        (expression
          (binary_expression
            (unary_expression
              (primary_expression
                (literal
                  (string_literal)))))))))
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (render_expression
      (expression
        (expression
          (binary_expression
            (unary_expression
              (primary_expression
                (identifier)))))
        (expression
          (binary_expression
            (unary_expression
              (primary_expression
                (identifier))))))))
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (render_expression
      (expression
        (expression
          (expression
            (binary_expression
              (unary_expression
                (primary_expression
                  (identifier)))))
          (expression
            (binary_expression
              (unary_expression
                (primary_expression
                  (identifier))))))
        (expression
          (binary_expression
            (unary_expression
              (primary_expression
                (identifier))))))
      (ternary_expression
        (expression
          (expression
            (binary_expression
              (unary_expression
                (primary_expression
                  (identifier)))))
          (expression
            (binary_expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression
                    (identifier))))
              (binary_operator)
              (builtin_test))))
        (expression
          (binary_expression
            (unary_expression
              (primary_expression
                (literal
                  (string_literal)))))))))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement
        (if_expression
          (expression
            (expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression
                    (identifier)))))
            (expression
              (binary_expression
                (unary_expression
                  (primary_expression
                    (identifier))))))))))
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (render_expression
      (expression
        (binary_expression
          (unary_expression
            (primary_expression
              (function_call
                (identifier)
                (arg
                  (expression
                    (expression
                      (binary_expression
                        (unary_expression
                          (primary_expression
                            (identifier)))))
                    (expression
                      (binary_expression
                        (unary_expression
                          (primary_expression
                            (identifier))))))))))))))
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement)))
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement)))
  (definition
    (words)))
